text: The Continental Beach Soccer Tournament, is a first edition of a beach soccer tournament that top ranked teams from Asia are invited to participate. The first edition was held in Summer 2016 in Ordos, China. == Summaries == {| border=1 style="border-collapse:collapse; font-size:90%; text-align:center;" cellpadding=3 cellspacing=0 width=100% |-
